meanings.definition: The act of granting authority or power to carry out a particular task or duty.
meanings.sent1: The commissioning of the new project manager was a significant moment for the team.
meanings.sent2: The commissioning of the security guard ensured the safety of the building.
meanings.sent3: After commissioning the detective to solve the case, the mystery was finally unraveled.
meanings.sent4: The commissioning of the leader brought a sense of direction to the group.
meanings.sent5: With the commissioning of the teacher, the students found a mentor to guide them.

meanings.definition: The process of formally placing a ship, building, or piece of equipment into active service.
meanings.sent1: The commissioning of the new ship marked the beginning of its journey.
meanings.sent2: The commissioning of the factory was a cause for celebration among the workers.
meanings.sent3: During the commissioning of the spaceship, the crew felt a sense of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The commissioning of the aircraft carrier signified its readiness for deployment.
meanings.sent5: With the commissioning of the lighthouse, ships could safely navigate the waters.

meanings.definition: The act of ordering or requesting the production of a work of art or piece of music.
meanings.sent1: The commissioning of the painting was a special gift for the art collector.
meanings.sent2: The commissioning of the symphony orchestra led to a beautiful musical performance.
meanings.sent3: By commissioning the sculpture, the artist was able to showcase their talent.
meanings.sent4: The commissioning of the play brought together a talented cast of actors.
meanings.sent5: Through the commissioning of the composer, a masterpiece was created.
